name: A Cannoneer's Curse
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2021

A game in which you fire whatever you can out of a cannon to defeat enemies, whether that's yourself, or enemies bodies.

Destroy the three obelisks to summon the final boss and end the curse!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • X/Shift to pick up enemies' bodies, load them (or yourself) onto the cannon, or hop on the cannon when it's loaded.
  • Z/Space to fire the cannon when you're on (or in) it 
  • Any key to advance dialogue

Sound effects (CC0) are mostly by rubberduck on opengameart.org

Music (CC0) is by SubspaceAudio on opengameart.org, here.

All art/code by me. @Thoof4 on Twitter, @thoof_dev on Instagram
